subtitle.first: I'm 22 years old and live in the Li√®ge region. Passionate about creating practical tools and elegant websites, I'm constantly looking for new ideas and opportunities to learn.
subtitle.second: It was during my bachelor's degree in graphic techniques that I discovered the world of web development. Initially, it was the infinite possibilities offered by this field that captivated me, but very quickly, I developed a true passion for coding itself.
subtitle.third: Today, what I seek above all is to discover, experiment, and continually progress.
